docs.title: DateTimeProvider class
docs.text:
Simple implementation used for IDateTimeProvider

public class DateTimeProvider : IDateTimeProvider

docs.title: Public Members
docs.text: name description DateTimeProvider() The default constructor. Now { get; } Basic implementation wchich returns current system DateTime based on Now TimeOfDay { get; } Basic implementation wchich returns current system Time of day based on TimeOfDay Today { get; } Basic implementation wchich returns current system date based on Today UtcNow { get; } Basic implementation wchich returns current system DateTime converted to Utc based on UtcNow UtcTimeOfDaty { get; } Basic implementation wchich returns current system Time of day converted to Utc based on TimeOfDay UtcToday { get; } Basic implementation wchich returns current system date converted to Utc based on Date

docs.title: IDateTimeProvider interface
docs.text:
Simple interface for mocking DateTime used for unit testing and configuration in mocks time used in tests.

public interface IDateTimeProvider

docs.title: Members
docs.text: name description Now { get; } Gets current system DateTime TimeOfDay { get; } Gets Time of Day and returns Timespan Today { get; } Current system Date UtcNow { get; } Gets current system DateTime converted to Utc format. UtcTimeOfDaty { get; } Gets Time of Day and returns Timespan converted to Utc format UtcToday { get; } Current system Date converted to Utc.
